ai-ya3.3.2:1.1_0: The one who, having lost his eyes, ears, nose and tongues,
ai-ya3.3.2:2.1_0: But one who, having exertioned the sense-spheres and the fields of that sense-field -
ai-ya3.3.2:3.1_0: The one who doesn’t want to be reborn there, (but) forget that sense-fields are not lost.
ai-ya3.3.2:4.1_0: But one who doesn’t completely understand the dimension of neither perception nor non-perception, and who leads to the complete assembly.
